title: SML Mahindra Website â€” Modern Redesign (Frontend)

requirements.summary: Design and implement a bold, modern visual theme across the entire site with dark charcoal/steel base palette, vibrant amber/orange accent, sharp geometric layout, premium sans-serif typography, smooth scroll animations, and subtle gradient or glassmorphism card effects.
acceptanceCriteria: A cohesive color palette (dark base + amber accent) is used throughout all sections
Typography is modern, legible, and consistent across headings and body text
No outdated design patterns (gradients, drop shadows, or table-based layouts from the early 2000s) are present
Smooth CSS transitions/animations are applied to interactive elements and section reveals

file_operations.description: Extend the Tailwind theme with the dark charcoal/steel base palette (e.g., neutral-900, slate-800) and vibrant amber/orange accent colors (e.g., amber-500, orange-600). Add custom animation configurations for smooth scroll reveals and transitions.

Apply global typography using a premium sans-serif font stack (e.g., Inter, system-ui). Set base text color to light gray on dark background. Add CSS custom properties for the color palette. Include smooth scroll behavior and subtle glassmorphism/gradient utilities for card effects.

requirements.summary: Build a full-width hero section on the homepage with a large background image, bold headline about SML Mahindra's commercial vehicle legacy, a short tagline, two prominent CTA buttons, and an animated navigation bar that becomes opaque on scroll.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section spans full viewport width and height
Two CTA buttons are visible and functional (scroll to relevant sections)
Navbar is transparent on top, transitions to solid on scroll
Mobile-responsive hamburger menu is present

file_operations.description: Create a Hero component with a full-width, full-height container. Use the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as the background. Display a bold headline, short tagline, and two CTA buttons ('Explore Vehicles' and 'Find a Dealer') that scroll to their respective sections. Apply dark overlay and modern typography.

Create a Navbar component that is transparent by default and transitions to a solid dark background with glassmorphism on scroll. Include navigation links (Home, Vehicles, Dealers, About, Contact) that scroll to sections. Add a mobile-responsive hamburger menu. Use frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-mark.dim_256x256.png as the brand logo.
Import and render the Navbar and Hero components at the top of the single-page layout. Ensure Navbar is sticky/fixed and Hero is the first section below it.

requirements.summary: Create a vehicle catalog section showcasing SML Mahindra's product lineup with a responsive grid of modern cards, each showing a vehicle image, name, category tag, and a 'View Details' button. Clicking a card opens a modal or detail view with key specifications.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 6 vehicle cards are displayed in a responsive grid (3 columns on desktop, 1-2 on mobile)
Each card shows image, name, category, and CTA button
Clicking a card opens a modal/drawer with vehicle specs
Filter tabs or dropdown allow filtering by vehicle category

file_operations.description: Create a VehicleCard component that displays a vehicle image (use generated images: frontend/public/assets/generated/vehicle-lcv.dim_800x500.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vehicle-bus.dim_800x500.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vehicle-truck.dim_800x500.png), vehicle name, category tag (styled badge), and a 'View Details' button. Apply glassmorphism card styling with hover effects. On button click, trigger a callback to open the detail modal.

Create a VehicleDetailModal component (using shadcn/ui Dialog or Sheet) that displays full vehicle specifications (name, category, engine details, dimensions, payload capacity, fuel type, etc.). Accept a vehicle object as a prop and render it in a modern card layout with the vehicle image and specs grid. Include a close button.

Create a VehicleCatalog section component that renders a responsive grid (3 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile) of VehicleCard components. Maintain local state for the list of vehicles (at least 6 sample entries covering buses, trucks, LCVs) and the selected vehicle for the modal. Include filter tabs or a dropdown above the grid to filter by category (All, Buses, Trucks, LCVs). Manage modal open/close state and pass the selected vehicle to VehicleDetailModal.
Import and render the VehicleCatalog component as a section below the Hero. Ensure it has a section ID ('vehicles') for scroll navigation from the Hero CTA and Navbar links.

requirements.summary: Build a dealer/service locator section where users can search for nearby dealers by city or state. Display results in a styled list with dealer name, address, phone number, and a 'Get Directions' link. Query backend dealer data.
acceptanceCriteria: Search input accepts city or state text and filters backend dealer records
Results list updates dynamically based on input
Each result card shows dealer name, address, phone, and a Google Maps directions link
At least 10 sample dealer entries are pre-seeded in the backend

file_operations.description: Create a DealerCard component that displays dealer name, city, state, address, phone number, and a 'Get Directions' link (constructed as a Google Maps search URL using the address). Style the card with dark theme, subtle borders, and amber accent on hover.

Create a DealerLocator section component with a search input (placeholder: 'Enter city or state') and a results list container. Use React Query to fetch dealers from the backend (getAllDealers on mount, then filter locally by city/state, or call getDealersByCity/getDealersByState based on input). Render DealerCard components for each result. Show a loading state and empty state ('No dealers found') as needed.
Import and render the DealerLocator component as a section below VehicleCatalog. Assign it a section ID ('dealers') for scroll navigation from the Hero CTA and Navbar links.

requirements.summary: Add an 'About Us' section highlighting SML Mahindra's history, key milestones, and values using a modern timeline layout for milestones and an icon-grid for core values.
acceptanceCriteria: Timeline of at least 5 company milestones is displayed with year and description
Core values section uses icons with labels
Section is visually distinct and uses the global design theme

file_operations.description: Create an AboutSection component with two subsections: a timeline of at least 5 company milestones (year and description) styled with a vertical or horizontal line connecting milestone nodes, and a core values grid displaying icons with labels (e.g., Innovation, Reliability, Service). Use the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/section-bg-texture.dim_1920x600.png as a subtle background texture. Apply dark theme and amber accents.
Import and render the AboutSection component as a section below DealerLocator. Assign it a section ID ('about') for scroll navigation from the Navbar links.

requirements.summary: Implement a Contact & Inquiry form that captures user details (name, email, phone, subject, message), stores the inquiry in the backend, and shows a success confirmation toast.
acceptanceCriteria: All form fields are present and have validation (required fields, email format)
Submission saves the inquiry to backend stable storage
A success toast is shown after successful submission
Form resets after successful submission

file_operations.description: Create a ContactForm component with input fields for name, email, phone, subject (dropdown: Sales, Service, Dealership, Other), and message (textarea). Use React Hook Form for validation (required fields, email format). On submit, call the backend submitInquiry method using React Query mutation. On success, display a toast notification (using shadcn/ui Toast) and reset the form. On error, show an error toast.
Import and render the ContactForm component as a section below AboutSection. Assign it a section ID ('contact') for scroll navigation from the Navbar links.

requirements.summary: Build a sticky footer with SML Mahindra branding, quick navigation links, social media icon links, and a copyright notice styled with the dark theme and amber accent.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer is present on all views/sections
Quick links scroll to the corresponding sections on the single-page layout
Social media icons are present (LinkedIn, Twitter/X, YouTube as placeholders)
Copyright line is visible

file_operations.description: Create a Footer component with the SML Mahindra brand name (or logo mark from frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-mark.dim_256x256.png), quick navigation links (Home, Vehicles, Dealers, About, Contact) that scroll to section IDs, social media icon placeholders (LinkedIn, Twitter/X, YouTube), and a copyright notice. Style it with dark background, light text, and amber accent on hover. Ensure it is sticky at the bottom of the page.
Import and render the Footer component at the bottom of the single-page layout, below all sections.

requirements.summary: Render all generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them throughout the UI (hero background, vehicle cards, about section).
acceptanceCriteria: All images load correctly from frontend/public/assets/generated
No broken image links are present
Images are appropriately sized and display crisply on retina/HD screens

file_operations.description: Verify that the Hero component references the generated hero background image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as a background-image or img src. Ensure the path is correct and the image loads without errors.

Verify that VehicleCard components reference the generated vehicle images (frontend/public/assets/generated/vehicle-lcv.dim_800x500.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vehicle-bus.dim_800x500.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vehicle-truck.dim_800x500.png) in their image src attributes. Ensure images are sized appropriately and load crisply on HD screens.

Verify that the AboutSection component references the generated section background texture image frontend/public/assets/generated/section-bg-texture.dim_1920x600.png as a background or decorative element. Ensure the image loads correctly.

Verify that the Navbar component references the generated logo mark image frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-mark.dim_256x256.png as the brand logo. Ensure the image is sized appropriately and loads without errors.
